title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3819/86 of 15 December 1986 amending Regulations (EEC) Nos 2213/76 and 2315/76 on the sale of skimmed-milk powder from public storage and of butter from public storage
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3819/86
of 15 December 1986
amending Regulations (EEC) Nos 2213/76 and 2315/76 on the sale of skimmed-milk powder from public storage and of butter from public storage
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussel, 15 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 119, 8. 5. 1986, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 249, 11. 9. 1976, p. 6.
(4) OJ No L 76, 21. 3. 1986, p. 13.
(5) OJ No L 261, 25. 9. 1976, p. 12.
(6) OJ No L 76, 21. 3. 1986, p. 12.
